definition: the act of sucking, empty or clean (a body cavity) by the force of suction
details:
noun
- the act of sucking
= synonyms: sucking
- a force over an area produced by a pressure difference
verb
- empty or clean (a body cavity) by the force of suction
= example: empty or clean (a body cavity) by the force of suction
- remove or draw away by the force of suction
= example: remove or draw away by the force of suction
